headline: Why Molson Coors (TAP) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of beer company Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) fell 3.3% in the afternoon session after BNP Paribas SA downgraded the stock to underperform from a neutral rating.

headline: Is Molson Coors (TAP) Price Missing The Mark After Recent Brand Portfolio Reassessment?
summary: If you are wondering whether Molson Coors Beverage is attractively priced right now, its current set of valuation checks gives a clear starting point for that assessment. The share price sits at US$50.64 after a 7.2% return over the past week, 5.9% over the past month and 6.8% year to date, while the 1-year return of a 4.5% decline contrasts with 12.3% and 14.9% gains over 3 and 5 years respectively.
